Hi Bashar,


Hope all is well.

 

The KYC is for Marsh (Insurance Brokers) as required for the UAE Central Bank as part of its regulatory role in the insurance sector.

 

The details are required for MCTC. However, the central bank regulation requires the ultimate beneficial Owner (UBO) details to the shared until natural person(s) are reached. 

 

The KYC form needs to be filled up only for MCTC. However, the full chain needs to be provided as well until the UBO details are established but only as supporting documents. 

 

Since MCTC is owned by OBI, Marsh requested the trade license as well of OBI. This is the rationale behind the request.

 

Best if you can provide the full chain until Chalhoub Group Limited as it will be requested once Marsh have the shareholder details of OBI.

 

Trust the above clarifies.

 

Thank You & Kind Regards,

Hagop

Subject: RE: JB Policy - Chalhoub/MCT FZE_POLICY DOCUMENT

 

Hi Bashar,


Hope all is well.

 

The KYC is for Marsh (Insurance Brokers) as required for the UAE Central Bank as part of its regulatory role in the insurance sector.

 

The details are required for MCTC. However, the central bank regulation requires the ultimate beneficial Owner (UBO) details to the shared until natural person(s) are reached. 

 

The KYC form needs to be filled up only for MCTC. However, the full chain needs to be provided as well until the UBO details are established but only as supporting documents. 

 

Since MCTC is owned by OBI, Marsh requested the trade license as well of OBI. This is the rationale behind the request.

 

Best if you can provide the full chain until Chalhoub Group Limited as it will be requested once Marsh have the shareholder details of OBI.

 

Trust the above clarifies.

 

Thank You & Kind Regards,

Hagop

Subject: RE: JB Policy - Chalhoub/MCT FZE_POLICY DOCUMENT

 

Hi Bashar,


Hope all is well.

 

The KYC is for Marsh (Insurance Brokers) as required for the UAE Central Bank as part of its regulatory role in the insurance sector.

 

The details are required for MCTC. However, the central bank regulation requires the ultimate beneficial Owner (UBO) details to the shared until natural person(s) are reached. 

 

The KYC form needs to be filled up only for MCTC. However, the full chain needs to be provided as well until the UBO details are established but only as supporting documents. 

 

Since MCTC is owned by OBI, Marsh requested the trade license as well of OBI. This is the rationale behind the request.

 

Best if you can provide the full chain until Chalhoub Group Limited as it will be requested once Marsh have the shareholder details of OBI.

 

Trust the above clarifies.

 

Thank You & Kind Regards,

Hagop

Subject: RE: JB Policy - Chalhoub/MCT FZE_POLICY DOCUMENT

 

Hi Bashar,


Hope all is well.

 

The KYC is for Marsh (Insurance Brokers) as required for the UAE Central Bank as part of its regulatory role in the insurance sector.

 

The details are required for MCTC. However, the central bank regulation requires the ultimate beneficial Owner (UBO) details to the shared until natural person(s) are reached.

 

The KYC form needs to be filled up only for MCTC. However, the full chain needs to be provided as well until the UBO details are established but only as supporting documents.

 

Since MCTC is owned by OBI, Marsh requested the trade license as well of OBI. This is the rationale behind the request.

 

Best if you can provide the full chain until Chalhoub Group Limited as it will be requested once Marsh have the shareholder details of OBI.

 

Trust the above clarifies.

 

Thank You & Kind Regards,

Hagop

Subject: RE: JB Policy - Chalhoub/MCT FZE_POLICY DOCUMENT

 

Hi Bashar,


Hope all is well.

 

The KYC is for Marsh (Insurance Brokers) as required for the UAE Central Bank as part of its regulatory role in the insurance sector.

 

The details are required for MCTC. However, the central bank regulation requires the ultimate beneficial Owner (UBO) details to the shared until natural person(s) are reached.

 

The KYC form needs to be filled up only for MCTC. However, the full chain needs to be provided as well until the UBO details are established but only as supporting documents.

 

Since MCTC is owned by OBI, Marsh requested the trade license as well of OBI. This is the rationale behind the request.
